I love little web toys like this one.
And I love that this generates CSS that I can use on my site.

Not sure I'm actually gonna use it, but here's one I made:

```css
.drhayes-splotch {
  border-image: url('data:image/png;base64,')
    28 / 28px / 0 round;
  border-width: 28px;
  border-style: solid;
}
```

Check it out: https://maxbittker.github.io/broider/
